subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Physical Therapy
Therapy and Rehabilitation
lead_paragraph: U.S. midfielder John O'Brien's body has been like a game of medical Mouse Trap over the last four years, with one biomechanical problem leading to another in a debilitating chain reaction.
snippet: U.S. midfielder John O'Brien's body has been like a game of medical Mouse Trap over the last four years, with one biomechanical problem leading to another in a debilitating chain reaction.
